name: Connect5 With Pals
description:
★★★ FREE FOR A LIMITED TIME ONLY ★★★

Everyone's favorite strategy game is now out on the App Store!
If you like strategy boardgames, if you like to challange your friends and family, you will love Connect5 With Buddies! Connect5 With Buddies is the classic five in a row (=Connect Five) game with a little twist, you can play it ONLINE MULTIPLAYER with all of your friends!! Climb up rankings! Get into highscores and much much more!

Connect5 is extremely easy to learn but takes a lifetime to master!
Who is the master among your friends?
